title: Oedipus Rex. No. 2. The character of Oedipus
creator_credit: John Barnes, Massachusetts Council for the Humanities and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Analyses the character and actions of Oedipus in terms of Aristotle’s theory of the “fatal flaw” in all tragic characters. Presents important scenes from the drama to show character development. Suitable for upper secondary level.
